channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.description:
Report E-2023110156

item.title: Report X-2023100615
item.description:
Report X-2023100615

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-13T18:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-30
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100288
item.description:
Report X-2023100288

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-26
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE CAPS WERE CRACKED AND LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC JUGS CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.
